title: Like it is
creator_credit: Chris Begley, George Nevile, John Brawley and Tony D'Aquino
brief_description: When an elderly women is forced to have her beloved budgie put down, a vet’s assistant is disturbed by his employer’s unscrupulous practices. A touching short film about human compassion. Cast includes Dylan Lewis, Frank Gallacher and Dawn Klingberg.
creator_credit_for_label: Chris Begley, George Nevile, John Brawley and Tony D’Aquino
